title: 108_hr2093
content: Old Man of the Mountain Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue not more than 50,000 $5 gold coins and 350,000 $1 silver coins emblematic of the Old Man of the Mountain . Directs that surcharges be paid by the Secretary to the Old Man of the Mountain Revitalization Fund, Inc. to be used for the objects and purposes of such fund.
